title: Strengthening Practical Teaching Competencies: Mixed Reality (MR)-Based Secondary Mathematics Job Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can improve spatial reasoning ability by 30% by manipulating 3D geometric models in an MR environment.
Learners acquire the ability to model functions applicable to real-life problems through mixed reality simulations.
Learners derive data visualization and analysis results with 80% accuracy while performing project-based tasks on a collaborative MR platform.
